semantics.label: Arapāho

fields.label: Momo
fields.description: He kōwhiringa kia tāpiritia tētahi rauemi arapāho ki runga i te pātai.

semantics.label: Whakamārama mō te ngohe
semantics.description: Whakamāramahia mai te ara mā te kaiwhakamahi e mahi ai i tēnei ngohe.
semantics.default: Tōia ngā kupu ki ngā wāhi tuku e tika ana.

semantics.label: Tuhinga
semantics.placeholder: Ko *Hikurangi* te maunga mō Ngāti Porou, ko *Taupiri* te maunga mō te Kīngitanga, ko *Tongariro* te maunga mō Tūwharetoa.  Kei  *Te Ika a Māui: Te moutere* ēnei maunga e tū ana.

important.description:
• Ka tohua ngā kupu ka taea te tuku mā te tohuwhetū (*) kei mua, kei muri hoki i te kupu tika, ngā kupu tika rānei.
  • Ka taea te tāpiri he tuhinga tīwhiri mā te whakauru i te irarua (:) ki mua i te tīwhiri.
  • Mō ia tūnga wātea, kotahi anake te kupu e tika ana.
  • Ka tae hoki te tāpiri he urupare e whakaaturia i te oting o te mahi. Whakamahia '\+' mō ngā urupare tika '\-' mō ngā urupare hē.
important.example:
Ka taea te whakawhanake ngā ihirangi H5P pēnei i tēnei *pūtirotiro:He aha te momo taupānga o Chrome?*.
He *pāhekoheko\+Kei te tika! \-Kei te hē, whakamātauria anōtia!*

semantics.label: Kupu tinihanga
semantics.description: Tukuna he otinga hē, kia manawarau ai te kaiwhakamahi. Whakamahia ngā tohuwhetū (*) pērā ki ngā tuhinga o runga.

semantics.label: Urupare Whānui

fields.label: Whakatauria he urupare motuhake mō ia wehenga piro
fields.description: Pāwhiria te pātene "Tāpirihia he wehenga" ki te tāpiri i ngā wehenga piro e hiahia ana koe. Hei tauira: 0-20% Ngoikore, 21-91% Whiwhinga Kai Parāoa, 91-100% Autaia!

semantics.label: Tapanga mō te pātene "Tirohia"
Tapanga mō te pātene "Tukuna"
Tapanga mō te pātene  "Whakamātau anō"
Tapanga mō te pātene "Whakaatu otinga"
Tapanga nama mō te wāhi tuku
semantics.description: Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka pānui te taupānga pānui tuhinga i te nama o te wāhi tuku. Mō te taurangi: @index

semantics.label: Tapanga mō te wāhi tuku wātea
semantics.default: Kei te wātea te wāhi tuku @index.
semantics.description: Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka kī te taupānga pānui tuhinga - kei te wātea te wāhi tuku, mō te taurangi: @index

semantics.label: Tapanga mō te kupu tō kei te wāhi tuku
semantics.default: Kei te Wāhi Tuku @index ko te @draggable.
semantics.description: Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka kī te taupānga pānui tuhinga - he kupu tō kei te wāhi tuku.

semantics.label: Tapanga mō ngā kupu tō
semantics.description: Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka kī te taupānga pānui tuhinga he kupu tō tēnei. Mō ngā taurangi: @index, @count

semantics.label: Tapanga mō te pātene whakaatu tīwhiri
semantics.description: Tapanga mō te whakaatu tīwhiri, ka pānuitia e te taupānga pānui tuhinga i mua i te pātene whakaatu tīwhiri.

semantics.label: Ngā kupu a te taupānga pānui tuhinga mō te whakautu tika
Ngā kupu a te taupānga pānui tuhinga mō te whakautu hē
Taitara o te pouaka kōrero Whakaū, mō ngā wā ka hiahia te kaiwhakamahi ki te whakahoki i tētahi kupu tō
Whakamārama o te pouaka kōrero Whakaū, mō ngā wā ka hiahia te kaiwhakamahi ki te whakahoki i tētahi kupu tō
semantics.default: Āe mārika ka hiahia koe ki te whakahoki tēnei wāhi tuku?

semantics.label: Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka whakaatu te taupānga pānui tuhinga, kua tīmata te tō
Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka whakaatu te taupānga pānui tuhinga, kua monoa te tō
Tapanga mō te tomopai, ka whakaatu te taupānga pānui tuhinga, kua tika te kupu tō
Pane mō te pae e whakaatu ana i ngā urupare mō ngā whakautu tika, hē rānei
Kōwhiringa whanonga
semantics.description: Mā ēnei kōwhiringa whanonga, ka taea te whakahaere i ngā whanonga o tēnei ngohe.

semantics.label: Whakaaturanga ā-tuhi o te pae piro mō te hunga e whakamahi ana i ngā taupānga pānui tuhinga
semantics.default: I whiwhi koe :num o :total ka taea

semantics.label: Tapanga hangarau tomopai mō te pātene "Tirohia"
semantics.default: Tirohia ngā whakautu. Ka tohua ngā whakautu tika, hē, kāore i whakautua rānei.

semantics.label: Tapanga hangarau tomopai mō te pātene "Whakaatu otinga"
semantics.default: Ka whakaaturia te otinga tika mō tēnei pātai, ngohe rānei.

semantics.label: Tapanga hangarau tomopai mō te pātene  "Whakamātau anō"
semantics.default: Whakamātauria anōtia te ngohe. Ka whakakorengia ngā whakautu, ā, ka tīmatahia anōtia te ngohe.
